title: Algotica – Iteration 1 1.0.5 – An educational adventure-puzzle game
content: Algotica is an educational adventure-puzzle game about programming, along with a story that breaks the fourth wall. If you wanted to start learning programming but it seems too difficult to understand, you don’t have enough time, or you’re just not sure that you need it – this game is a great place to start.   […]

title: Tab Launcher 2.9.5 – Clean up and organize the Dock
content: The idea of Tab Launcher is not to replace the system’s dock, but to help keep it clean, with only the applications that are currently running.   By removing all the application from the dock and organizing them on tabs, you can quickly find and run any application you want.   Apart from that, you […]

title: Remixvideo 1.1.4 – Enhance your live shows with Remixvideo, the intuitive video sampler
content: Remixvideo is the weapon of choice for creative video mixing, with a slick grid interface that makes DJs/producers instantly feel at home.   It offers two ways to enhance music performances with visuals: linking audio samples to video pads in standalone mode, or playing it as a video plug-in within your favorite music software. Running […]

title: aerofly RC 7.4.7 – R/C flight simulator
content: Learn to fly radio controlled (R/C) models with aerofly RC 7. When it comes to learning and improving R/C flying skills, aerofly RC 7 is the number one choice for R/C pilots. title: aerofly FS 1.3.3 – Enter the world of flying in a quality never seen before
content: aerofly FS lets you enter the world of flying in a quality never seen before. aerofly FS sets a high value on realistic flight physics, highly detailed aircraft and terrain and smooth frame rates. title: Dr.Fone for iOS 8.2.1 – iPhone Data Recovery Software
content: Dr.Fone for iOS – World’s 1st Mac iPhone and iPad data recovery software.   Recover iPhone data on Mac with three ways. title: Mr. Shifty 1.0 – A new kind of action & adventure game

title: Flying Logic Pro 3.0.7 – A spreadsheet-style reasoning tool
content: Flying Logic Pro is a highly visual, easy-to-use software application that does for reasoning what spreadsheets do for numbers. title: Desk 3.1 – Writing, Blogging, and Notes for WordPress

title: Viscera Cleanup Detail 1.0 – First-Person Bloody Simulation Game
content: Disaster! An alien invasion and subsequent infestation have decimated this facility. Many lives were lost, the facility was ruined and the aliens were unstoppable.
